front.title: Design Considerations for an NSIS Transport Layer Protocol

abstract.t: A framework for NSIS is in preparation, and will identify a splitinto two layers. The lower layer, referred to as the NSIS TransportLayer Protocol (NTLP) provides generic support for different types ofpath coupled signalling, including QoS signalling. This documentdiscusses issues to be considered in the design of an NSIS TransportLayer Protocol (NTLP).
